title: EXTINCTION: The Dark Fae
description: Previously published as the duet 'Dark Fae Extinction' by Quinn This is a new editionA dark fae warrior took me captive;I am an unwilling slave, hell-bent on destroying him;But in the end, it could be me destroyed - heart and soul.The world was plunged into eternal darkness, riddled by famine and plague. Then when most of humanity had fallen, they came to finish us off.The dark fae, cruel warriors of myth, came to kill the last of us.I'm Coralie - and I won't go down without a fight.A brutal, lone fae warrior, a lost and wounded human - and desires so forbidden they must be fought.
author: Quinn Blackbird
